message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll love. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm starting at $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you're looking for a deal, but $12000 is below my minimum. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16000. Can we shake on it?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $16000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to compromise a bit further. I can do $15500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $15500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
I'm starting to think we're getting into the final stretch. I'm willing to meet you at $14000. Can we make a deal?
I'm close to walking away, but I really want this product. I'm willing to pay $13000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $13000, but I'm willing to meet you at $13500. This is my final offer, and I think it's a fair price considering the value of the product.
I'm not willing to pay $13500. I'm going to have to walk away from this deal. I'll consider buying the product from John for $10000 instead.
